application. Takes tokens from user and sets apply stage end time.","params":{"_amount":"The number of GOV tokens a user is willing to potentially stake","_data":"Extra data relevant to the application. Think IPFS hashes.","tokenAddress":"The hash of a potential listing a user is applying to add to the registry // TODO adapt comment"}},"canBeWhitelisted(bytes32)":{"details":"Determines whether the given listingHash be whitelisted.","params":{"_listingHash":"The listingHash whose status is to be examined"}},"challenge(bytes32,string)":{"details":"Starts a poll for a listingHash which is already in the whitelist. Tokens are taken from the challenger and the applicant's deposits are locked.","params":{"_data":"Extra data relevant to the challenge. Think IPFS hashes.","_listingHash":"The listingHash being challenged, whether listed or in application"}},"challengeCanBeResolved(bytes32)":{"details":"Determines whether voting has concluded in a challenge for a given listingHash. Throws if no challenge exists.","params":{"_listingHash":"A listingHash with an unresolved challenge"}},"challengeExists(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns true if the application/listingHash has an unresolved challenge","params":{"_listingHash":"The listingHash whose status is to be examined"}},"claimReward(uint256)":{"details":"Called by a voter to claim their reward for each completed vote. Someone must call updateStatus() before this can be called.","params":{"_challengeID":"The PLCR pollID of the challenge a reward is being claimed for"}},"claimRewards(uint256[])":{"details":"Called by a voter to claim their rewards for each completed vote. Someone must call updateStatus() before this can be called.","params":{"_challengeIDs":"The PLCR pollIDs of the challenges rewards are being claimed for"}},"deposit(bytes32,uint256)":{"details":"Allows the owner of a listingHash to increase their unstaked deposit.","params":{"_amount":"The number of GOV tokens to increase a user's unstaked deposit","_listingHash":"A listingHash msg.sender is the owner of"}},"determineReward(uint256)":{"details":"Determines the number of tokens awarded to the winning party in a challenge.","params":{"_challengeID":"The challengeID to determine a reward for"}},"finalizeExit(bytes32)":{"details":"Allow a listing to leave the whitelist","params":{"_listingHash":"A listing hash msg.sender is the owner of"}},"getChallenges()":{"details":"Getter for easy handling of Challenges in the Front-End"},"getListings()":{"details":"Getter for easy handling of listings in the Front-End"},"getWhitelistedListingKeys()":{"details":"Gets only the listingKeys from whitelisted listings, for easy display in frontend token lists which are curated"},"init(address,address,address,string)":{"details":"Initializer. Can only be called once.","params":{"_token":"The address where the GOV token contract is deployed"}},"initExit(bytes32)":{"details":"Initialize an exit timer for a listing to leave the whitelist","params":{"_listingHash":"A listing hash msg.sender is the owner of"}},"isWhitelisted(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns true if the provided listingHash is whitelisted","params":{"_listingHash":"The listingHash whose status is to be examined"}},"tokenClaims(uint256,address)":{"details":"Getter for Challenge tokenClaims mappings","params":{"_challengeID":"The challengeID to query","_voter":"The voter whose claim status to query for the provided challengeID"}},"updateStatus(bytes32)":{"details":"Updates a listingHash's status from 'application' to 'listing' or resolves a challenge if one exists.","params":{"_listingHash":"The listingHash whose status is being updated"}},"updateStatuses(bytes32[])":{"details":"Updates an array of listingHashes' status from 'application' to 'listing' or resolves a challenge if one exists.","params":{"_listingHashes":"The listingHashes whose status are being updated"}},"voterReward(address,uint256)":{"details":"Calculates the provided voter's token reward for the given poll.","params":{"_challengeID":"The pollID of the challenge a reward balance is being queried for","_voter":"The address of the voter whose reward balance is to be returned"},"return":"The uint indicating the voter's reward"},"whoAmI()":{"details":"Getter used for testing"},"withdraw(bytes32,uint256)":{"details":"Allows the owner of a listingHash to decrease their unstaked deposit.","params":{"_amount":"The number appWasMade(bytes32).details: Returns true if apply was called for this listingHash

params._listingHash: The listingHash whose status is to be examined

applyToken(address,uint256,string).details: Allows a user to start an application. Takes tokens from user and sets apply stage end time.

params._amount: The number of GOV tokens a user is willing to potentially stake
params._data: Extra data relevant to the application. Think IPFS hashes.
params.tokenAddress: The hash of a potential listing a user is applying to add to the registry // TODO adapt comment

canBeWhitelisted(bytes32).details: Determines whether the given listingHash be whitelisted.

params._listingHash: The listingHash whose status is to be examined

challenge(bytes32,string).details: Starts a poll for a listingHash which is already in the whitelist. Tokens are taken from the challenger and the applicant's deposits are locked.

params._data: Extra data relevant to the challenge. Think IPFS hashes.
params._listingHash: The listingHash being challenged, whether listed or in application

challengeCanBeResolved(bytes32).details: Determines whether voting has concluded in a challenge for a given listingHash. Throws if no challenge exists.

params._listingHash: A listingHash with an unresolved challenge

challengeExists(bytes32).details: Returns true if the application/listingHash has an unresolved challenge

params._listingHash: The listingHash whose status is to be examined

claimReward(uint256).details: Called by a voter to claim their reward for each completed vote. Someone must call updateStatus() before this can be called.

params._challengeID: The PLCR pollID of the challenge a reward is being claimed for

claimRewards(uint256[]).details: Called by a voter to claim their rewards for each completed vote. Someone must call updateStatus() before this can be called.

params._challengeIDs: The PLCR pollIDs of the challenges rewards are being claimed for

deposit(bytes32,uint256).details: Allows the owner of a listingHash to increase their unstaked deposit.

params._amount: The number of GOV tokens to increase a user's unstaked deposit
params._listingHash: A listingHash msg.sender is the owner of

determineReward(uint256).details: Determines the number of tokens awarded to the winning party in a challenge.

params._challengeID: The challengeID to determine a reward for

finalizeExit(bytes32).details: Allow a listing to leave the whitelist

params._listingHash: A listing hash msg.sender is the owner of

getChallenges().details: Getter for easy handling of Challenges in the Front-End

getListings().details: Getter for easy handling of listings in the Front-End

getWhitelistedListingKeys().details: Gets only the listingKeys from whitelisted listings, for easy display in frontend token lists which are curated

init(address,address,address,string).details: Initializer. Can only be called once.

params._token: The address where the GOV token contract is deployed

initExit(bytes32).details: Initialize an exit timer for a listing to leave the whitelist

params._listingHash: A listing hash msg.sender is the owner of

isWhitelisted(bytes32).details: Returns true if the provided listingHash is whitelisted

params._listingHash: The listingHash whose status is to be examined

params._voter: The voter whose claim status to query for the provided challengeID

updateStatus(bytes32).details: Updates a listingHash's status from 'application' to 'listing' or resolves a challenge if one exists.

params._listingHash: The listingHash whose status is being updated

updateStatuses(bytes32[]).details: Updates an array of listingHashes' status from 'application' to 'listing' or resolves a challenge if one exists.

params._listingHashes: The listingHashes whose status are being updated

voterReward(address,uint256).details: Calculates the provided voter's token reward for the given poll.

params._challengeID: The pollID of the challenge a reward balance is being queried for
params._voter: The address of the voter whose reward balance is to be returned

voterReward(address,uint256).return: The uint indicating the voter's reward

withdraw(bytes32,uint256).details: Allows the owner of a listingHash to decrease their unstaked deposit.

params._amount: The number of GOV tokens to withdraw from the unstaked deposit.
params._listingHash: A listingHash msg.sender is the owner of.
